description.displayText: I can't recommend Marie highly enough! She came and watched my 3-year old for a few days when his daycare was suddenly closed. She is so flexible, professional, sweet and she was wonderful with our son. She plays, entertains, teaches and loves on kids wonderfully. I look forward to hiring her again. She was truly the best!
description.originalText: I can't recommend Marie highly enough! She came and watched my 3-year old for a few days when his daycare was suddenly closed. She is so flexible, professional, sweet and she was wonderful with our son. She plays, entertains, teaches and loves on kids wonderfully. I look forward to hiring her again. She was truly the best!

description.displayText:
Marie is a nanny to our 15-month-old toddler, and we cannot speak highly enough of her!  Everyone in the family, from us to the baby, the extended family, and the dog, absolutely loves Marie.  She is dependable and punctual, showing up with such a positive personality.  Rather than this just being a paycheck for her, she really loves our daughter, who lights up when she walks in the room (not to mention, the dog lights up as well).  Marie is sensitive to our daughter's needs and anticipates our needs as well.  On a daily basis, she goes above and beyond the call of duty to care for the house, the dog, and other items that she sees may need attention.  We enjoy her presence as if she were one of the family.  She would be an amazing addition to your family as well; we recommend her very highly!  Please feel free to reach out to us for a reference.
-K. and Rich H.

description.displayText: Marie is such a wonderful woman! Our family loves her. She's such a positive person and always comes into our home with a smile. She truly loves kids and our kids always looks forward to seeing her when we go on date nights. I am happy we hired her and trust her to always take good care of my two girls.
description.originalText: Marie is such a wonderful woman! Our family loves her. She's such a positive person and always comes into our home with a smile. She truly loves kids and our kids always looks forward to seeing her when we go on date nights. I am happy we hired her and trust her to always take good care of my two girls.

description.displayText: Marie is a very lovely girl. She had to babysit my 2 children (4 years old and 8 years) one night. They both loved her so much that they keep asking me about when she's coming back. She is complete, I have no complaints about her.
description.originalText: Marie is a very lovely girl. She had to babysit my 2 children (4 years old and 8 years) one night. They both loved her so much that they keep asking me about when she's coming back. She is complete, I have no complaints about her.

description.displayText: Marie seemed very nice during our in person interview and my daughter really liked her. I told her I would need two references and once they checked out I wanted to proceed with hiring her. She said she would send them to me, that evening I texted her thanking her for meeting with us and again reminded her about needing to check references. I was in a pinch for a sitter in the next couple of days so I wanted to make sure I could check with references sooner rather than later. I got no response from Marie, it's since been over a week and I was able to find a sitter. I sincerely wish she would have responded back either accepting or declining. One star for showing up.
description.originalText: Marie seemed very nice during our in person interview and my daughter really liked her. description.displayText: Marie quickly warmed up to our four children by interacting with them and paying attention to each of their unique interests.  She has stayed all day and also for shorter time periods.  She is a responsible, self-starter and we all look forward to her return.
description.originalText: Marie quickly warmed up to our four children by interacting with them and paying attention to each of their unique interests.  She has stayed all day and also for shorter time periods.  She is a responsible, self-starter and we all look forward to her return.

description.displayText:
I've hired Marie as I needed some help with the kids after school. She's been a life saver handling: pick ups/drop offs, homework, cooking and cleaning, and even laundry! We love that she's always willing to help and does it with a smile; the girls love to spend time with her as they play, go to the park, or go get frozen yogurt together!
Definitely one of the best sitters we've hired!

description.displayText: We hired Marie to look after our sons on occasional date nights. She's very sweet and the kids love her. She's always been reliable and pleasant to work with!
